short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Only keep the single element visible by a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
only show the single element with a click
Allows you to remove any element from a website, foucus your attention on your interesting web content.



Features:
- highlight element under the cursor
- only see the highlight element with a click
- minimal memory and better performance
